name: KOKORO Amsterdam
description:
KOKORO is a boutique advertising agency, founded by Wouter Vanhaeren, Merlijn van Vliet and Rik Heijmen in 2013 and means 'Heart, mind and spirit' in Japanese. We believe consumers choose with their hearts. That's why we connect the hearts of brands to the hearts of people by establishing an emotional connection. Whether its a digital campaign, a commercial, social media, trans media storytelling or guerilla adfare.
Our communication needs to always strike a nerve, stir the senses, move people.
